snippet: Frank Beamer has decided this will be his final season as Virginia Tech’s coach, ending a 29-year run in Blacksburg, Va., that made Beamer Ball synonymous with winning.
abstract: Virginia Tech football coach Frank Beamer announces he will retire at end of season; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Frank Beamer has decided this will be his final season as Virginia Tech’s coach, ending a 29-year run in Blacksburg, Va., that made Beamer Ball synonymous with winning.

headline.main: Virginia Tech Coach Beamer to Retire
headline.print_headline: Virginia Tech’s Beamer to Retire After 29 Years

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
